title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger in Yellow/Black (DCK240C2). This powerful and versatile combo kit is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or professional contractor.

The DCD771 Drill/Driver is designed to tackle any task with its compact and lightweight design. It features a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck for easy bit changes and an ergonomic handle for comfort and control. With a speed transmission ranging from 0 to 1500 RPM, you can easily adjust the power output to suit your needs. The DCD771 also delivers an impressive 300 unit watts out (UWO) of power, ensuring efficient performance every time.

The DCF885 Impact Driver is equally impressive with its compact and lightweight design. Measuring just 5.55 inches front to back and weighing only 2.8 lbs, this impact driver is perfect for tight spaces and extended use. The 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips and features 1-handed loading for convenience. Plus, the built-in LED light ring with 3 LEDs provides superior visibility, even in dark areas, with a 20-second delay time.

With 2 included batteries and a charger, you'll never have to worry about running out of power. The yellow and black color scheme adds a touch of style to your tool collection, while the LED foot light ensures superior visibility while you work.

This DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is packed with features and built to last. Whether you're a professional contractor or a DIY enthusiast, this kit is perfect for a wide range of applications. The package includes 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2x 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and 1x Charger.

Don't miss out on this incredible deal. Get the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit today and take your projects to the next level!

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit! This power tool combo kit comes with 2 batteries and a charger, so you'll never be caught without power. The sleek Yellow/Black design adds a touch of style to your toolkit.

The DCD771 Drill/Driver is a true workhorse. With its compact and lightweight design, it's perfect for those tight spaces. It features a 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck, allowing for quick and easy bit changes. The ergonomic handle ensures comfort and control while you work. Plus, with a power output of 300 UWO and a speed transmission that ranges from 0 to 1500 RPM, this drill can handle any task you throw at it.

The DCF885 Impact Driver is a versatile tool that will make your projects a breeze. Its compact design, measuring just 5.55 inches front to back, allows for easy maneuverability in tight spaces. Weighing only 2.8 lbs, you won't feel weighed down during long hours of work. The 1/4-inch hex chuck accepts 1-inch bit tips, and with the 1-handed loading feature, you can change bits quickly and easily. The built-in LED light ring, with 3 LEDs and a delay time of 20 seconds, provides superior visibility without shadows, so you can work with precision.

This kit includes everything you need to get started: the DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver, the DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver, 2 20V Lithium Ion Batteries, and a Charger. With 2 batteries included, you can work for longer periods without interruption. The charger ensures that your batteries are always ready to go.

The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is designed for a wide range of applications. Whether you're a professional contractor or a DIY enthusiast, this kit has got you covered. And with the LED foot light providing superior visibility, you can work confidently in any lighting conditions.

Upgrade your toolkit with the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit. Don't miss out on this powerful and reliable tool set. Get yours today and experience the DEWALT difference!

Introducing the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger in Yellow/Black (DCK240C2). This high-quality combo kit is perfect for all your drilling and impact driving needs. 

The DCD771 drill/driver features a powerful motor with a maximum power output of 300 UWO, allowing you to tackle even the toughest tasks with ease. With its compact and lightweight design, this drill is comfortable to hold and easy to maneuver. The 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck ensures secure bit retention and easy bit changes. The ergonomic handle further enhances control and comfort during use.

The DCF885 impact driver is also compact and lightweight, measuring just 5.55 inches front to back and weighing only 2.8 lbs. It features a 1/4-inch hex chuck that allows for easy one-handed bit loading. The impact driver accepts 1-inch bit tips, making it versatile for various applications. The built-in LED light ring with 3 LEDs provides superior visibility, eliminating shadows and making your work easier. The light has a delay of 20 seconds, giving you ample time to see your work area clearly.

This combo kit includes 2 20V lithium-ion batteries and a charger, ensuring that you always have power when you need it. The batteries provide long-lasting performance and can be recharged quickly with the included charger. The yellow/black color scheme adds a touch of style to your tool collection.

But that's not all! The DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit also features a LED foot light for superior visibility. This additional feature ensures that you can work in even the darkest corners with ease.

With its wide range of applications and the convenience of having two powerful tools in one kit, the DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit is a must-have for any DIY enthusiast or professional. Don't miss out on this incredible deal!

- 1x DCD771 20V max 1/2-inch Drill/Driver

- 1x Charger
